title: AIML - Sr Manager, Data Operations
summary: The AIML Annotation Operations team is seeking a highly motivated, experienced manager to lead an operations team that delivers high-quality data for ML algorithm development.
description: You are a proven project and people manager who can thrive in a fast-paced workplace. You will collaborate with engineering teams and data requestors to deploy scalable data pipelines.
preferred_qualifications: MBA, Experience managing complex data collection or annotation projects.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay range for this role is between $97,344 and $188,100 annualized. Apple employees have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder and receive benefits including medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products, free services, and reimbursement for certain educational expenses.
